organization.name: met-office
organization.title: Met Office
organization.description: The Met Office is the UK’s national weather service. It provides weather and climate-related services to the Armed Forces, government departments, the public, civil aviation, shipping, industry, agriculture and commerce.

result.title: Customer contact information dataset

extras.value: N/A.  Release of personal data to a member of the public (otherwise than under the Freedom of Information Act) would contravene the data protection principles.  Among other things, disclosure of these personal data would contravene the first principle set out in Schedule 1 to the Data Protection Act 1998 of fair and lawful processing.  It would be against the public interest to contravene the provisions of statute (the Data Protection Act 1998).
